# ARView.CameraMode.nonAR

**Case**

A mode that creates a fully virtual environment with no relationship to the real world.

## Declaration

```swift
case nonAR
```

## Discussion

Use this mode to create pure virtual 3D environments using [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ARView]. RealityKit doesn’t place `.nonAR` content into the real world and, as a result, doesn’t require a front-facing device camera.

## Setting the camera mode

- **ARView.CameraMode.ar**: A mode that uses the device’s camera to place virtual entities relative to the real world.
